W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: The duo's adventure has begun. Will they be able to protect the president?

W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_100_DETAIL.text: The duo's adventure has begun anew. What worlds will they visit this time?

W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You weren't able to capture the mysterious man, and the only clue guiding you now is a single triangle.

W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_DETAIL.text: Quisstatium is an organization shrouded in mystery. If you wish to learn more about them, you will need to collect triangles.

W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_300_DETAIL.text: You've been obtaining triangles for a while now, but you're no closer to solving the mysteries of Quisstatium.

W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_500_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_500_DETAIL.text: You still need a few more triangles.

W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_700_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_700_DETAIL.text: Only one triangle to go. The end is almost at hand!

W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_DETAIL.text: You've finally obtained all the triangles. Now you can finally unravel the mysteries of Quisstatium.

W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_110_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_110_DETAIL.text: You're going to need more information if you want to solve the mysteries of Quisstatium. You can't very well press the president directly on this.

W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_400_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_400_DETAIL.text: You're halfway through your journey to collect the triangles.

W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_710_DETAIL.text: The owner of the last triangle came as a surprise, but it's now time for the final battle.

W18_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You can now see the green line even in Capitol Cityâ€”but what does it even mean?

W18_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_100_DETAIL.text: Does being able to see the future mean losing your freedom?

W18_EVAR_BOFO_1STMISSON_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_1STMISSON_000_DETAIL.text: Does this elevator really lead to the presidential grounds? Or does it go somewhere else?

W18_EVAR_BOFO_1STMISSON_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_1STMISSON_100_DETAIL.text: Are you acting of your own free will? Or simply riding the rails of destiny?

W18_EVAR_BOFO_MISSON_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_MISSON_000_DETAIL.text: Your journey to gather the triangles isn't over yet.

W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_000_DETAIL.text: This is a government-affiliated laboratory that seems to be involved in secret research.

W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_BATTLE_SIM_010_DETAIL.text: You found a simulator that will allow you to fight virtual aliens.

W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_SINGER_000_DETAIL.text: A large crowd is gathered in front of the stage.

W18_EVAR_BOFO_CRYSTAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_CRYSTAL_000_DETAIL.text: A distinctive crystal is currently being displayed inside the Capitol building of the Union States.

W18_EVAR_BOFO_DISCUSSION_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_DISCUSSION_000_DETAIL.text: This is just an ordinary office lounge. There's nothing special about it.

W18_EVAR_BOFO_FORUM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_FORUM_000_DETAIL.text: Foreign diplomats, researchers, and NGOs are gathered here for a meeting.

W18_EVAR_BOFO_MANHALL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_MANHALL_000_DETAIL.text: It all started in this very location...

W18_EVAR_BOFO_LIFT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_LIFT_000_DETAIL.text: Perhaps it's unusual to think nostalgically of an elevator.

W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_VIP_HOTEL_000_DETAIL.text: You have no specific reason to be here, but there's no harm in stopping by and feeling like part of the bourgeoisie.

W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_DETAIL.text: This is likely the place with the most foot traffic in the whole of Capitol City.

W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_CATS_000_DETAIL.text: A famous cat-loving woman is known to appear here.

W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_000_DETAIL.text: It feels like so long ago that you used to spend time here.

A00_BOFO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
A00_BOFO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You should return to the presidential grounds and explain the situation to Hernandez.

A00_BOFO_RETURN_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
A00_BOFO_RETURN_001_DETAIL.text: It's time to search for the next triangle.

A00_BOFO_RETURN_002_DETAIL.speaker: UI
A00_BOFO_RETURN_002_DETAIL.text: You now have all the triangles. It's time to go back and piece them together.
